definition[0]: the skin on the top of your head
example[0]: Massage the shampoo gently into your hair and scalp.
definition[1]: to buy tickets for an event and sell them again at a much higher price
definition[2]: to cut the hair and skin off the head of a dead enemy as a sign of victory
example[1]: guys that scalp tickets outside the stadium
definition[3]: to buy and quickly sell small quantities of SECURITIES (=bonds, shares etc), in order to make small but fast profits
example[2]: Traders try to scalp profits as contract prices rise and fall.
